attributes.action: Make Veterans past and Present TAX FREE
attributes.additional_details:
All EX VETERANS/PAST AND PRESENT should have their PENSION TAX FREE.  They served in many CONFLICT'S and WARs yet they receive little from the Government.

Its a DISGRACE seeing all those men and women coming back from many conflicts and when their service is done they are heavily TAX. PLEASE FOR ALL THEY GET MAKE IT TAX FREE.
